channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘My brother found God in recovery’: How do you save for retirement when ‘God will provide’ is your core value?
item.description: “Are there CFPs who are more aligned with a pragmatic, yet Christian, approach?”

item.title: AST SpaceMobile’s deal with Verizon validates the boom in satellite stocks
item.description: AST SpaceMobile’s stock was soaring after a deal with Verizon gave investors what they’ve been betting on and more.

item.title: Money may not buy happiness, but it can buy a longer life
item.description: Older adults with the fewest financial resources die much earlier than those with more wealth.

item.title: ‘I don’t wish to be petty’: My mom, 94, is leaving her $1 million estate to me, my brother and his daughter. Is that fair?
item.description: “My share of the home alone would be valued at $300K per the trust. If she distributes the funds three ways, my share becomes $200K.”

item.title: I dumped my boyfriend because he earned $40K less than me. Am I a jerk for wanting my next partner to make more money?
item.description: Instead of focusing on money, it might be helpful to evaluate whether you find someone motivating and inspiring.

item.title: Get in on the ground floor: An emerging giant in commodities and forex that's off Wall Street's radar
item.description: Investor Jeff Hirsch profiles an under-the-radar financial powerhouse delivering consistent growth across commodities, FX, and clearing.

item.title: Morgan Stanley highlights stocks that could see big earnings surprises this quarter
item.description: Morgan Stanley highlighted companies such as Roblox and Reddit that could surprise investors to the upside as third-quarter earnings are reported.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades biopharma stock to overweight on strong drug pipeline
item.description: JPMorgan foresees shares of Ionis Pharmaceuticals rising another 16% from their Tuesday close after a 170% runup in six months.

item.title: This insurance stock is breaking out, but remains cheap. How to get long with options
item.description: Tony Zhang breaks down a vertical call spread on this health insurance stock.

item.title: Buy this defense giant as its long-term prospects improve, says Deutsche Bank
item.description: The bank upgraded the aerospace and defense stock to buy from hold.
